subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Television
Advertising and Marketing
Production
lead_paragraph: The 16.9 million American viewers of this year's World Cup final were a 152 percent leap from 2002, but ABC and ESPN could learn a thing or two about soccer from Univision.
snippet: The 16.9 million American viewers of this year's World Cup final were a 152 percent leap from 2002, but ABC and ESPN could learn a thing or two about soccer from Univision.
